quote_first: The clock on the wall read
quote_last: . Cork wanted to turn the hands back, do it all differently, be in all the right places at all the right times. He wanted a second chance at the last few days. The last few years.
title: Purgatory Ridge
author: William Kent Krueger

quote_first: “Oh, Mr. MacLear,” he said jocularly, “I am glad you have just managed to escape breaking the Sabbath! You have had a close shave! It
quote_time_case: wants ten minutes, hardly more, to the awful midnight hour
title: Salted with Fire
author: George MacDonald

quote_last: , I got up extremely quietly, took my things from under the bed, and opened the door one millimeter at a time, so it wouldn’t make any noise.
title: Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close
author: Jonathan Safran Foer
